title: Natural Language Interaction - Voice Recognition for Task Execution
justification: Mike needs to efficiently monitor his patients' health and maintain communication with them, which can be facilitated through voice commands for quick access to vital information. This aligns with his goal of providing effective remote care while managing time constraints due to travel.
subOption: Voice recognition for task execution

title: Real-Time Health Monitoring Alerts – Notifications for Caregivers on Abnormal Readings
justification: Mike needs to efficiently monitor his patients' health status and receive real-time alerts regarding any anomalies in their vital signs, which directly supports his goal of providing preventative care and early intervention.
subOption: Notifications for caregivers on abnormal readings

title: Seamless Communication Channels – Video Calling Capabilities
justification: Mike Johnson's role as a home-care nurse involves maintaining regular communication with his patients, especially those who are socially isolated. Video calling capabilities would enhance his ability to connect with these patients, providing a more personal touch to remote monitoring and care.
subOption: Video calling capabilities

title: Simplified User Interface - Intuitive Navigation for Quick Access
justification: Mike needs to efficiently monitor patients' health and maintain communication with them, requiring quick access to critical information. An intuitive navigation system aligns with his goal of managing care remotely, especially given his challenges with long travel times and limited resources.
subOption: Intuitive navigation for quick access

title: Contextual Assistance Features - Context-Aware Prompts for Health Management
justification: Mike needs to monitor his patients' health effectively and support their emotional well-being. Context-aware prompts can facilitate timely interventions and ensure he remains connected with socially isolated patients, addressing both his core goals and challenges.
subOption: Context-aware prompts for health management

title: Privacy-Respecting Data Access – User-Controlled Consent for Data Sharing
justification: Mike, as a home-care nurse, needs to access his patients' health data to monitor their well-being effectively. User-controlled consent empowers older adults to maintain their privacy while allowing Mike to obtain necessary information for care, aligning with his goal of providing personalized and respectful support.
subOption: User-controlled consent for data sharing

title: Task Management Support - Reminders for Caregiving Tasks
justification: Mike needs to efficiently monitor his patients' health and maintain communication, and reminders for caregiving tasks would help him stay organized and ensure that critical care activities are not overlooked, especially given the long travel times between patient visits.
subOption: Reminders for caregiving tasks

title: Feedback Mechanisms for Improvement – Reporting Tools for Caregiver Experiences
justification: As a home-care nurse, Mike needs to monitor his patients' health effectively and coordinate care, which can be enhanced through feedback mechanisms that allow him to report on his experiences and challenges with the system. justification: Mike emphasizes maintaining connections with socially isolated patients, and facilitating group communications can enhance social interaction for these individuals, directly supporting his goal of fostering engagement and connection.

justification: Mike's role as a home-care nurse involves supporting elderly patients, particularly those who are socially isolated.
